item.title: 常用软件记录
item.description: 记录个人常用的软件 Application Typora: Typora is a minimal markdown editor, providing new ways for reading and writing markdown. iTerm2: iTerm2 is a replacement for Terminal and the successor to iTerm. Snipaste: Snipaste is a simple but powerful snipping tool, and also allows you to pin the screenshot back onto the screen. Notion: All-in-one workspace. Dash: Dash gives your Mac instant offline access to 200+ API documentation sets. Alfred: Alfred is an award-winning app for macOS which boosts your efficiency with hotkeys, keywords, text expansion and more.
